long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New tab, and take note!  

Kotes turns every new tab into rich text editor. 📝
Complete with text styling, formatting, Coloring, and Highlighting, Kotes enhances the quality of your note. ✨
With library, Save multiple notes! 📚

5 starting themes and (upcoming) customizable color theme. 🌈

Turn every new tab into rich text editor with Kotes: Rich text new tab notes!
